title: Executive Order 5042-Placing the Position of Press Helper in the Bureau of Engraving and Printing Into the Classified Civil Service
content: The position of press helper in the Bureau of Engraving and Printing is hereby brought with the present incumbents into the competitive classified service. Vacancies in this position hereafter will be filled in accordance with the rules governing the classified civil service.
This order is recommended by the Treasury Department and the Civil Service Commission.
citation: Calvin Coolidge, Executive Order 5042-Placing the Position of Press Helper in the Bureau of Engraving and Printing Into the Classified Civil Service Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360762
